activate-read.desc: Activate Read to enable reading feature

deactivate-read.desc: Deactivate Read to disable reading feature

read-current-page.desc: Read text on current page only

read-from-current-page.desc: Read text from current page to end of document

rate.desc: Drag to adjust the speed to be faster or slower

volume.desc: Drag to turn the voice up and down

error.document-not-openned: Cannot read aloud because no document is open
